section.name: Teeda Extension Abstraction
section.p: Teeda Extension is presentation framework that is build on Teeda Core(JSF implementation). It has the features below.

dl.dd: It doesn't use JSP but uses HTML as template. So we can edit views by tools that you like without special IDE support, preview using internet browsers. ( Detail )
"Page class" that is one side in pair with template html has contents to show and related logic. It is very simple because HTML template and Page class can be a pair.( Detail )
Teeda uses RPG (POST-REDIRECT-GET) pattern for view transition. So there is no difference between page contents and URL. ( Detail )
Because HTML template and Page class are binded by the convention, Teeda doesn't require much configuration files.
Teeda can deal with HOT deploy of Seasra2.4, It can add and modify views and check immediately with running Web container such as Tomcat.
